A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
TL;DR\, this is the worst Star Wars ever made.  Don't give Disney any more money than they have already swindled out of people.  Wait to see this on Redbox for a dollar.  Disney betrayed the Star Wars fan base with this film.

I have been a SW fan since I was kid in the 80s.  I got heavily into the EU in the 90s\, read most of the novels (stopped at Yuuzhan Vong stories due to lack of interest)\, I played many of the games including X-Wing\, Tie Fighter\, Galaxies\, KOTOR\, SWTOR.  

Here is my list of issues with this movie.

- Mary Sue lead still not dealt with effectively\, Rey gets $h1t tier training and can do everything
- Identity politics message front and center
- Non- believable depressed Luke Skywalker (Hammill tried to stop them but they would not listen\, look this up on Youtube)
- Anti-climactically off multiple main characters
- Unbelievable force use scene with Leia which is becoming known as the "Space Mary Poppins Leia"
- Really cringey scene on the island that involves Luke milking a sea mammal of some sort and then tasting the milk reacting like it was whiskey.
- Make Anti-Capitalist tirade while using capitalism making billions while destroying Star Wars
- Canto Bite story arc completely unnecessary\, leads to mistakes by 3 lead characters which indirectly lead to death of hundreds\, never elaborated on.
- Escape sequence takes whole movie\, drags on and on and the reason for it is not believable and is a stretch for the tech in the SW universe.
- Deus ex Machina planet
- Phasma still sucks
- "Let the past die\, kill it if you have to"\, You mean destroy our favorite character's stories and while extracting as much capital from the corpse of the franchise.
